name: Tie back11 - subtlety & protection
description:
The tie back top came through whilst on a holiday.. 6-7 year ago. Inspired to create, without sewing machine at hand..had to think of a way of cutting a garment that didn't require sewing to hold it together.. ' Tie back' was born! Originally it was just cut and had no finishing around edges.. Now we use a very fine baby lock to prolong its life..:)... wear it many ways.. as a singlet long or short,as a halter neck, as an apron,back to front as an open or closed vest etc.. One customer wears hers as a scarf..:) Possibilities are endless.. 'tie back' has become one of our favourites.. each piece is individually hand printed in our studio.
You can choose "any" earth colour"... tie dyed or block colour.. we dye and print one by one.
Print can be chosen in ochre brown or black.

name: Beginning of Time Robe - Peace with Earth
description:
This linen kaftan has been created to fit almost any shape and size. The garment was organically dyed and handled with grace and love to our mother Earth. Can be worn in a few ways and combined with different garments. Will keep you warm during winter and will cool you down is summer

100% linen
fits 8-14…


Here's flowers for you;
Hot lavender, mints, savoury, marjoram;
The marigold, that goes to bed wi' the sun
And with him rises weeping: these are flowers
Of middle summer, and I think they are given 
To men of middle age.
The Winter's Tale (4.4.122-7)
William Shakespeare

name: Beginning of time - Linen Robe
description:
This textured linen jacket has been created to fit almost any shape and size. The garment was organically dyed and handled with grace and love. Can be worn in a few ways.. layered and combined with different garments. Will keep you warm during winter and will cool in summer…

100% linen
Fits 8-14

Linen textiles appear to be some of the oldest in the world: their history goes back many thousands of years. Fragments of straw, seeds, fibers, yarns, and various types of fabrics which date back to about 8000 BC have been found in Swiss lake dwellings. Dyed flax fibers found in a prehistoric cave in Georgia suggest the use of woven linen fabrics from wild flax may date back even earlier to 36,000 BP. In the Jewish faith, the only law concerning which fabrics may be interwoven together in clothing is one, which concerns the mixture of linen and wool. Linen is also mentioned in the Bible in Proverbs 31, a passage describing a noble wife. Proverbs 31:22 says, "She makes coverings for her bed; she is clothed in fine linen and purple."

name: Khalo Kaftan - 2 shades of flowers
description:
Beautifully hand printed with hand knotted fringe.
This Open–Long Kaftan can be worn multitudes of ways, belted, tied at the front, draped over one shoulder, upside down etc… see pictures below. It is a stand out piece. 
Available in two beautiful colours: Emerald green or Aubergine-brown.

Fabric: 100% Rayon

Size: Open Kaftan is free size and will fit most sizes.

Yet mark'd I where the bolt of Cupid fell:
It fell upon a little western flower,
Before milk-white, now purple with love's wound,
And maidens call it love-in-idleness.
A Midsummer Night's Dream (2.1.169-72)
William Shakespeare

name: Slash Vest
description:
This vest brings an edge with classical feel. Can be worn as an everyday piece or as a stand out for special occasions… Soft knit cotton with hand woven cascading frill.
Best worn loose or can try pinning or belting… Suitable for all seasons.
Fits sizes 8-12.
Available in Natural with indigo blue trim.

“Simplicity is the most difficult thing to secure in this world; it is the last limit of experience and the last effort of genius.”
George Sand

name: Upside down Wrap
description:
This versatile garment can also be worn up side down,wrapped around the body and also creates a hood like option. Will give you a feeling of going to another dimension - Alice's Adventures in Wonderland. So, please be aware of possibilities… You can wear it as a long wrap or as a short version, you can combine both possibilities with other garments… be creative…
Fits sizes 8-14. 
Stripes vary in colours.. underlying colours available- Stone blue, earth or ruby red. Please specify which colour in message box.

“The sun was shining on the sea, Shining with all his might: He did his very best to make The billows smooth and bright -- And this was odd, because it was The middle of the night."
Lewis Carroll, Alice in Wonderland

name: Hand knitted Poncho
description:
Poncho-Hand knitted 100% cotton. This is a versatile garment,can be worn showing different hemlines depending which direction neckline angles.. wear it over any outfit. Can also wear it as a wrap or a scarf.
Free size.]
Available in colours shown in pictures. Please specify which you would like in the message box.

name: Timeless Wrap
description:
Hand-woven unmercerised cotton with knitted sleeves.
Can be worn many ways.This piece brings comfort during cooler days…. The nurturing texture of this fabric creates a feeling of protection..:).

We have some in cream so we can dye one for you.. any earthy colours....

Love poem:
Though I go to you
ceaselessly along dream paths,
the sum of those trysts
is less than a single glimpse
granted in the waking world.
Ono no Komachi, Japanese waka poet, (c. 825 – c. 900)

name: Masai inspired Dress
description:
This dress has an open neckline embroidered by hand in Masai style… Works beautifully as a dress but also can be combined with pants as a tunic.. loose or belted. This dress takes quite some time to make as each stitch is made carefully  a-mano….Let it bring a positive charge to person who wears it… *                       

Ask for colour range...

That man's life is but a dream -
is what we now come to know.
Its house abandoned,
the garden has become home
to butterflies.
Monk Sogi (1421 - 1502 ) was a zen monk and a poet: a master of renga

name: Hand printed Scarf. Simplicity? Yet? Complexity?
description:
Endless outcomes can be achieved using the same piece of fabric.. Like speech subtle changes make all the difference.. Hand printed and dyed each holds its own unique language. Three3 meters of 100% cotton.
Can choose any earthy color..we will dye it for you:)

0 solitary pine, how many Generations of men have you known?
Is it because of your great age
That the passing winds sing so clear a tone?
(Manyoshu VI: 1042)

Can make a beautiful gift

name: Poncho…. With a contemporary monastic scent…
description:
A poncho, punchu in Quechua (Mapudungun pontro, blanket, woolen fabric) is an outer garment designed to keep the body warm or, if made from a watertight material, to keep dry during rain. Ponchos have been used by the Native American peoples of the Andes since pre-Hispanic times and are now considered typical South American garments. Nowadays ponchos are used as garments that are comfortable yet bring the other edge to your style.
Free size-Only available in charcoal black.

Apollo And The Graces
APOLLO

WHICH of the fairest three
To-day will ride with me?
My steeds are all pawing at the threshold of the morn:
Which of the fairest three
To-day will ride with me
Across the gold Autumn's whole Kingdom of corn?

John Keats

name: Mongol Vest - with freedom
description:
This hand-constructed vest is a free expression of its fabric. Beautiful soft hand woven un mercerised 100% cotton. After some wear takes on your shape..and gets better and better with age. This is one of our most favourite stapes. A piece that in its understated simplicity can match anything…
Fits sizes 8-12
Choose any earthy colour and we will dye one for you.

name: Meridian
description:
Intricately created slash lines follow the meridian paths, constructed by using a soft cotton knit with front woven cotton panel. Each is individually printed and dyed.
Fits sizes 8-12 the wider the body the shorter the hemline, on a size 8 will almost cover the hips..on a size 12 will sit at high hip.
Can choose any earthy colour and we will dye it for you.
Print can be ochre brown or black.
prints available- Mirror tree below as above) or double winter tree.

 The meridian also called channel (in Chinese medicine), is a path through which the life-energy known as "qi" flows...
